alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 28 at 5:20PM PST until November 29 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Pomeroy, Pullman, Rosalia, Clarkston, Tekoa, Uniontown, Colfax, Oakesdale, La Crosse, and Alpowa Summit. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Areas of near zero visibility will also occur along Highway 195 from Spokane to Colfax to Uniontown, just north of Lewiston Idaho. Thick fog will also occur along Highway 26 from Colfax to Washtucna.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
